skills.name: Throwing Axe
skills.description: Attacks with a flying axe and inflicts Continuous Damage for 3 turns with a 30% chance.

skill_effect.name: Continuous DMG
skill_effect.description: Deals 5% of monster's max HP as damage every turn

skills.name: Multiple Throw
skills.description: Throws 3 axes at an enemy. Your Attack Bar increases by 15% if this attack lands as a Critical Hit.

skill_effect.name: Increase ATB
skill_effect.description: The ATK bar of ally monsters is filled by a set amount. This allows ally monsters to attack again sooner.

skill_effect.name: Multiple Hits
skill_effect.description: Attack hits more than 1 time per use.

skills.name: Shout of Victory
skills.description: Fills up the Attack Bar of all allies by 50% and recovers 15% of their HP.
